name: Black Robes of Kazlakhor
data: It decreases the users strength pathetically.
It decreases the users constitution pathetically.
It increases the users wisdom poorly.
It increases the users intelligence impressively.
It has average armour class for its type (low in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration like a god.
This item loses its magical powers a bit faster than avarage.
It gives tiny bonus to the skill 'adaption of balance'.
It gives tiny bonus to the skill 'adaption of chaos'.
It gives tiny bonus to the skill 'adaption of order'.
It gives tiny bonus to the skill 'invocation'.
It gives tiny bonus to the skill 'evocation'.
